Room.Name: Hafnia East Gate/Mountain Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a rocky mountain path outside the east gate of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: There is snow all around you, but you notice that the trail has been well cleared of it. To the west, you see the massive gates of Hafnia, a mountain city. As you approach the gates, you start to see more and more people. Some wave to you as they pass by.
